a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Consumption-based CO₂ emissions vs. population share, 2020
[Consumption-based emissions](hover::general::consumptionbasedemissions) are national emissions that have been
adjusted for trade. This measures [fossil fuel and industry emissions](hover::general::fossilemissions). Land use
Source: Our World in Data based on Global Carbon Project (GCP); UN WPP (2022)
